name: BoinxTV TV recording
summary: Learn about .TVRECORDING files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: TVRECORDING files are used temporarily by BoinxTV while writing a MOV file or as a backup recording in case of a crash during recording. If a crash occurs, double click the TVRECORDING file, once it is restored, you can delete the TVRECORDING file.
NOTE: BoinxTV was succeeded by mimoLive and the TVRECORDING file is no longer used.

description: Temporary recording file used by BoinxTV, a video editor used to produce broadcasts such as lectures, podcasts, sermons, and more; contains a video recording while BoinxTV finalizes writing the video as a .MOV QuickTime file.
